summary: Mobile photo gallery + photo vault app with albums, basic editing, privacy lock/hidden folder, performance optimizations, and optional cloud backup.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist lock + photo mark logo, flat vector style (app-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Empty gallery illustration, dark/light friendly, simple shapes, no text (empty-gallery-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)
- Empty albums illustration, simple folder/album motif, no text (empty-albums-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and ensure all gallery data (photos, videos, albums, vault settings) is scoped per authenticated user principal.
Provide media library features: upload photos and videos, browse them in a fast, smooth-scrolling grid, and open a detail viewer for viewing with basic metadata (type, created/uploaded date, size).
Add album management: create albums, rename albums, delete albums, add/remove media items to/from albums, and reorder albums in the UI.
Add basic photo editing for images: crop, rotate, apply a small set of filters, and adjust brightness/contrast; allow saving edits as a new copy and optionally replacing the original.
Implement privacy features: allow marking media items as Hidden/Locked and provide a Vault section that requires an app-specific PIN unlock before showing locked items.
Add Dark mode / Light mode support with a simple, consistent UI and a distinct visual theme applied across all pages and components.
Optimize performance for large libraries by generating and using thumbnails for grid views, using efficient pagination/infinite scrolling, and avoiding loading full-resolution media until needed.
Add basic data management utilities: allow exporting the userâ€™s library metadata (and references) and importing from a previously exported file; include a clear warning about storage limits.
Generate and include static image assets for branding and empty states, and render them from frontend static assets (not via backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Browse/view photos and videos with fast, smooth scrolling gallery
Privacy & security: app lock (PIN/fingerprint) and hidden/locked folder (vault)
Dark mode / light mode UI theme support
Storage & permissions handling for on-device media (read/write access, import/export) plus cache management
Performance optimizations: fast image loading, thumbnail generation, memory optimization for large libraries
